name: Go Developer
description:
As a Go Engineer, you will work with a great international team here, including front end developers, UI/UX designers, product designer and testers, ability to explain complex technical issues to both technical and non-technical audiences, with a willingness to receive feedback and iterate on designs, and building web sites and applications with coworkers, using modern technology for help users around the world and bring the ultimate user experience to them.

Basic Qualifications:

  • Bachelor of Science Degree in Computer Science or related field;
  • 2+ years professional experience as backend developer (preferably Go/Java);
  • Computer Science fundamentals in data structures, algorithms and object-oriented design;
  • Proficiency in Golang;
  • Proficiency in any RDBMS (MySQL, PostgreSQL etc.);
  • Knowledge of best software engineering practices, including coding standards, code reviews, source control management, build processes, testing, and operations;
  • Able to communicate in English at work.

Preferred Qualifications

  • Experience building consumer facing complex and highly-loaded software systems;
  • Experience working with Linux OS
  • Big data analytics experiences in a large e-commerce company;
  • Knowledge of machine learning concepts, neural networks;
  • Proficiency in Docker and basic concepts of container-based deployments;
  • Ability to work with ambiguity and deliver result in a fast-paced environment.

Highly desirable skills (in one or more of the following areas)

  • 2 or more years of experience designing and architecting highly concurrent and multitenant distributed systems;
  • Hands-on experience in market governance for billion dollar open e-commerce platform;
  • Basic skills in Java SE or Kotlin;
  • Experiences in large scale live data/service migration in an Internet scale company;
  • Experience in building core algorithms for recommendation systems, data mining, machine learning, or artificial intelligence;
  • Expert knowledge in network and data security, fraud detection or risk control.

What we offer:

  1. Work for one of world's biggest IT companies, in Russia, without cross-border relocation International, young, and very professional engineering team;
  2. Comfortable office in Moscow City;
  3. Competitive salary with performance-based bonuses;
  4. Mac or Windows laptop of your choice;
  5. Corporate medical insurance.
